00053 
00054 String CommandShell::ms_history_file = "";
00055 
00056 namespace {
00057   void termination_handler (int signum) {
00058     write_history(CommandShell::ms_history_file.c_str());
00059     exit(1);
00060   }
00061 
00062   const char *help_text =
00063   "\n" \
00064   "Interpreter Meta Commands\n" \
00065   "-------------------------\n" \
00066   "?          (\\?) Synonym for `help'.\n" \
00067   "clear      (\\c) Clear command.\n" \
00068   "exit       (\\q) Exit program. Same as quit.\n" \
00069   "print      (\\p) Print current command.\n" \
00070   "quit       (\\q) Quit program.\n" \
00071   "source <f> (.)  Execute commands in file <f>.\n" \
00072   "system     (\\!) Execute a system shell command.\n" \
00073   "\n";
00074 }

00077 
00080 CommandShell::CommandShell(const String &program_name,
00081     CommandInterpreterPtr &interp_ptr, PropertiesPtr &props)
00082     : m_program_name(program_name), m_interp_ptr(interp_ptr), m_props(props),
00083       m_batch_mode(false), m_silent(false), m_test_mode(false),
00084       m_no_prompt(false), m_cont(false), m_line_read(0), m_notify(false) {
00085   m_prompt_str = program_name + "> ";
00086   m_batch_mode = m_props->has("batch");
00087   if (m_batch_mode)
00088     m_silent = true;
00089   else
00090     m_silent = m_props->get_bool("silent");
00091   m_test_mode = m_props->has("test-mode");
00092   if (m_test_mode) {
00093     Logger::set_test_mode(System::exe_name);
00094   }
00095   m_no_prompt = m_props->has("no-prompt");
00096 
00097   m_notify = m_props->has("notification-address");
00098   if(m_notify) {
00099     String notification_address = m_props->get_str("notification-address");
00100     m_notifier_ptr = new Notifier (notification_address.c_str());
00101   }
00102 
00103 }

00106 
00109 char *CommandShell::rl_gets () {
00110   if (m_line_read) {
00111     free (m_line_read);
00112     m_line_read = (char *)NULL;
00113   }
00114 
00115   /* Get a line from the user. */
00116   if (m_batch_mode || m_no_prompt || m_silent || m_test_mode) {
00117     if (!getline(cin, m_input_str))
00118       return 0;
00119     boost::trim(m_input_str);
00120     if (m_input_str.find("quit", 0) != 0 && !m_silent)
00121       cout << m_input_str << endl;
00122     return (char *)m_input_str.c_str();
00123   }
00124   else if (!m_cont)
00125     m_line_read = readline(m_prompt_str.c_str());
00126   else
00127     m_line_read = readline("         -> ");
00128 
00129   /* If the line has any text in it, save it on the history. */
00130   if (!m_batch_mode && !m_test_mode && m_line_read && *m_line_read)
00131     add_history (m_line_read);
00132 
00133   return m_line_read;
00134 }

00138 void CommandShell::add_options(PropertiesDesc &desc) {
00139   desc.add_options()
00140     ("batch", "Disable interactive behavior")
00141     ("no-prompt", "Do not display an input prompt")
00142     ("test-mode", "Don't display anything that might change from run to run "
00143         "(e.g. timing statistics)")
00144     ("timestamp-format", Property::str(), "Output format for timestamp. "
00145         "Currently the only formats are 'default' and 'usecs'")
00146     ("notification-address", Property::str(), "[<host>:]<port> "
00147         "Send notification datagram to this address after each command.")
00148     ;
00149 
00150 }

00152 
00153 int CommandShell::run() {
00154   const char *line;
00155   queue<string> command_queue;
00156   String command;
00157   String timestamp_format;
00158   String source_commands;
00159   const char *base, *ptr;
00160 
00161   ms_history_file = (String)getenv("HOME") + "/." + m_program_name + "_history";
00162 
00163   if (m_props->has("timestamp-format"))
00164     timestamp_format = m_props->get_str("timestamp-format");
00165 
00166   if (timestamp_format != "")
00167     m_interp_ptr->set_timestamp_output_format(timestamp_format);
00168 
00169   if (!m_batch_mode && !m_silent) {
00170 
00171     read_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00172 
00173     cout << endl;
00174     cout << "Welcome to the " << m_program_name << " command interpreter."
00175          << endl;
00176     cout << "For information about Hypertable, visit http://www.hypertable.org/"
00177          << endl;
00178     cout << endl;
00179     cout << "Type 'help' for a list of commands, or 'help shell' for a" << endl;
00180     cout << "list of shell meta commands." << endl;
00181     cout << endl << flush;
00182   }
00183 
00184   if (signal (SIGINT, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00185     signal (SIGINT, SIG_IGN);
00186   if (signal (SIGHUP, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00187     signal (SIGHUP, SIG_IGN);
00188   if (signal (SIGTERM, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00189     signal (SIGTERM, SIG_IGN);
00190 
00191   m_accum = "";
00192   if (!m_batch_mode)
00193     using_history();
00194   while ((line = rl_gets()) != 0) {
00195 
00196     try {
00197 
00198       if (*line == 0)
00199         continue;
00200 
00201       if (!strncasecmp(line, "help shell", 10)) {
00202         cout << help_text;
00203         continue;
00204       }
00205       else if (!strncasecmp(line, "help", 4)
00206                || !strncmp(line, "\\h", 2) || *line == '?') {
00207         command = line;
00208         std::transform(command.begin(), command.end(), command.begin(),
00209                        ::tolower);
00210         trim_if(command, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00211         m_interp_ptr->execute_line(command);
00212         if (m_notify)
00213           m_notifier_ptr->notify();
00214         continue;
00215       }
00216       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "quit") || !strcasecmp(line, "exit")
00217                || !strcmp(line, "\\q")) {
00218         if (!m_batch_mode)
00219           write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00220         return 0;
00221       }
00222       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "print") || !strcmp(line, "\\p")) {
00223         cout << m_accum << endl;
00224         continue;
00225       }
00226       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "clear") || !strcmp(line, "\\c")) {
00227         m_accum = "";
00228         m_cont = false;
00229         continue;
00230       }
00231       else if (!strncmp(line, "source", 6) || line[0] == '.') {
00232         if ((base = strchr(line, ' ')) == 0) {
00233           cout << "syntax error: source or '.' must be followed by a space "
00234               "character" << endl;
00235           continue;
00236         }
00237         String fname = base;
00238         trim_if(fname, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00239         off_t flen;
00240         if ((base = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(fname.c_str(), &flen)) == 0)
00241           continue;
00242         source_commands = "";
00243         ptr = strtok((char *)base, "\n\r");
00244         while (ptr != 0) {
00245           command = ptr;
00246           boost::trim(command);
00247           if (command.find("#") != 0)
00248             source_commands += command + " ";
00249           ptr = strtok(0, "\n\r");
00250         }
00251         if (source_commands == "")
00252           continue;
00253         delete [] base;
00254         line = source_commands.c_str();
00255       }
00256       else if (!strncasecmp(line, "system", 6) || !strncmp(line, "\\!", 2)) {
00257         String command = line;
00258         size_t offset = command.find_first_of(' ');
00259         if (offset != String::npos) {
00260           command = command.substr(offset+1);
00261           trim_if(command, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00262           HT_EXPECT(system(command.c_str()) == 0, Error::EXTERNAL);
00263         }
00264         continue;
00265       }
00266       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "status") || !strcmp(line, "\\s")) {
00267         cout << endl << "no status." << endl << endl;
00268         continue;
00269       }
00270 
00271 
00275       base = line;
00276       ptr = strchr(base, ';');
00277       while (ptr) {
00278         m_accum += string(base, ptr-base);
00279         if (m_accum.size() > 0) {
00280           boost::trim(m_accum);
00281           if (m_accum.find("#") != 0)
00282             command_queue.push(m_accum);
00283           m_accum = "";
00284           m_cont = false;
00285         }
00286         base = ptr+1;
00287         ptr = strchr(base, ';');
00288       }
00289       command = string(base);
00290       boost::trim(command);
00291       if (command != "" && command.find("#") != 0) {
00292         m_accum += command;
00293         boost::trim(m_accum);
00294       }
00295       if (m_accum != "") {
00296         m_cont = true;
00297         m_accum += " ";
00298       }
00299 
00300       while (!command_queue.empty()) {
00301         if (command_queue.front() == "quit"
00302             || command_queue.front() == "exit") {
00303           if (!m_batch_mode)
00304             write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00305           return 0;
00306         }
00307         command = command_queue.front();
00308         command_queue.pop();
00309         if (!strncmp(command.c_str(), "pause", 5)) {
00310           String sec_str = command.substr(5);
00311           boost::trim(sec_str);
00312           char *endptr;
00313           long secs = strtol(sec_str.c_str(), &endptr, 0);
00314           if ((secs == 0 && errno == EINVAL) || *endptr != 0) {
00315             cout << "error: invalid seconds specification" << endl;
00316             if (m_batch_mode)
00317               return 1;
00318           }
00319           else
00320             poll(0, 0, secs*1000);
00321         }
00322         else {
00323           m_interp_ptr->execute_line(command);
00324           if(m_notify)
00325             m_notifier_ptr->notify();
00326         }
00327       }
00328 
00329     }
00330     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00331       if (m_test_mode)
00332         cerr << "Error: " << e.what() << " - " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << endl;
00333       else
00334         cerr << "Error: " << e << " - " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << endl;
00335       if(m_notify)
00336         m_notifier_ptr->notify();
00337       if (m_batch_mode)
00338         return 1;
00339       m_accum = "";
00340       while (!command_queue.empty())
00341         command_queue.pop();
00342       m_cont=false;
00343     }
00344 
00345   }
00346 
00347   if (!m_batch_mode)
00348     write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00349 
00350   return 0;
00351 }
